meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of erythrocytes.
meanings.sent1: The erythrocytic cells carry oxygen throughout the body.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the patient's erythrocytic count to assess their health.
meanings.sent3: The erythrocytic dance of the red blood cells was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as an erythrocytic sunrise.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a vivid picture of the erythrocytic structure of blood cells.

meanings.sent1: The erythrocytic test results showed a high level of red blood cells.
meanings.sent2: The erythrocytic infusion helped improve the patient's condition.
meanings.sent3: The erythrocytic party was a gathering of red blood cell enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as deep as an erythrocytic ocean.
meanings.sent5: The erythrocytic nature of the blood sample was evident under the microscope.
